title: SPACIOUS 2 bed/2 bath in BEAUTIFUL Community in Studio City AVAIL Sept
posting_body: This beautiful 2 bedroom/2 bathroom comes with everything you need to call your new home!
This 9 unit intimate building includes gated parking.
2 reserved (tandem) spots are included with your apartment home.
*THIS COMMUNITY IS LOCATED IN A BEAUTIFUL NEIGHBORHOOD, SURROUNDED BY BEAUTIFUL HOMES OFF VINELAND/VENTURA.
THIS MAKES FOR A CENTRAL LOCATION NO MATTER

Literally everything is close by: Gelson's, Ralphs, Smart & Final, Target, Rite Aid, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, Citibank, Chase, Petco, Subway, Chipotle, Starbucks, In N Out, Baskin Robbins, GNC, Movie theaters, Parks, and plenty of gyms and shopping nearby!
Feel free to call, email, or text us to schedule a tour.
Interested prospective tenants will need to provide proof of income, and undergo a credit and background check.

Close by cities: Sherman Oaks, Studio City, North Hollywood, Burbank, Valley Village, Toluca Lake, Van Nuys, Encino, Tarzana, Woodland Hills, West Hills, Chatsworth, Northridge, North Hills, Granada Hills, Porter Ranch, Ventura Blvd, South Valley, Lake Balboa, Reseda, Sherman Village, Valley Glen, Universal City, NoHo, NoHo Arts District
